name: STPN TRUST
briefDescription: “STPN TRUST” was started by dedicated social work In Education,Health,Old Aged People,Women Empowerment. We are already running a Secondary and Higher Secondary English and Bengali Medium School where Students are getting Education at Free of Cost. Getting Free Mid Day Meal and Free Hostel Facilities.Apart From that we have helped financially to more than 60 People for their medical Treatment. More than 60 Students already have received Scholarship for their Higher Studies. We have distributed Cloths to Widows and Old Aged Poor people. Very Soon we are going to start Old Age Home For Old Aged Man & Women where all aged people will stay at Free of Cost. Their Fooding and Medical Treatment will also be completely Free.
